description: Timely Wills is a comprehensive platform designed to simplify the process of creating and managing essential legal documents, such as wills and powers of attorney. requirements: Send emails to users with custom templates
Self-hosted payments
Users can pay by promo codes or get discounts
Users can buy a promo code and send it to a relative via email
PDF generation with flexible templates and various datasets
Users can update documents for 1 year free (then subscription is required)
